original: Lindström, Alf Bertil Erik, disponent, Norrköping, f. 3/2/12 i Oravais, Finl., av fabr. Abel L. o. Mary La-gergrén. G. 38 m. Brita Petersson, — Realsk. t. 27, handelssk. 28, dipl. tex-tiling. i Stuttgart-Reutlingen 31, tekn. praktik i Tyskl., Schweiz o. Engl. t. o. m. 33. Disp., verkst. dir. samt styr:-led. i A-B Abel Lindströms Tricot-fabr. i Norrköp. sed. 38, därjämte konsult, verksamh. f. trikåind. samt föreläs, i trikåtekn. kursen v. o. led. av styr. f. Lennings textiltekn. insi. i Norrköp. Medl. av Sv. textiltekn. riksförb., Norrköp. polytekn. fören.. Norrköp. fältrittklubb, Sthlms fältritt-kiubb, Civi’la ryttarförb. o. Norrköp. segelsällsk. Arl. branschstudie- o. inköpsresor t. flert. europ. länder t. o. m. 39. Skr.: Trikàvarans teknologi (succ. 40-46). Hobbies: ridning, segling, skidåkning. RyttarGm.
translated: Lindström, Alf Bertil Erik, manager, Norrköping, b. 3/2/12 in Oravais, Finland, son of factory owner Abel L. and Mary Lagergrén. Married in 1938 to Brita Petersson. Attended a secondary school until 1927, then a commercial school until 1928, and obtained a diploma in textile engineering in Stuttgart-Reutlingen in 1931. Completed technical internships in Germany, Switzerland, and England until 1933. Became a manager, executive director, and board member of A-B Abel Lindströms Tricot-factory in Norrköping starting from 1938. Also served as a consultant and engaged in activities related to the knitwear industry, including giving lectures in the knitwear technology course established by the board of Lennings Textile Technology Institute in Norrköping. Member of the Swedish textile engineering national association, Norrköping Polytechnic Association, Norrköping Equestrian Club, Stockholm Equestrian Club, Civil Equestrian Association, and Norrköping Sailing Club. Took industry-related study and procurement trips to several European countries until 1939. Author of "Technology of Knitted Fabrics" (successful from 1940-1946). Hobbies include horseback riding, sailing, and skiing. Married to an equestrian partner.
